item.title: Centos PHP 7 LAMP boilerplate
item.description:
This time we are going to cook Apache (httpd 2.4), PHP 7.0 as a PHP-FPM . Instructions are pretty simple. You can just copy and paste command to get working stack in less then 15 minutes.

What you can learn from it? How to install Apache 2.4 and PHP 7, how to enable and opcache, and how to install HTTPS on your server, with purchasing SSL certificate.

item.title: CodeIgniter IMG – thumbnails on the fly
item.description: CodeIgniter library to generate high quality thumbnails Library is based on excellent * Smarty plugin “Thumb” * created in 2005 by Christoph Erdmann. This version is a little different, we are using core from Thumb, and some modification which gives more flexibility to work with it. Features thumbnails are generated “on the fly” no additional actions required, cache for generated thumbnails, clear structure for generated thumbnails, thumbnails sharpening function, cropping function, fill space function Usage You need to upload file img.

item.title: Google Storage for Developers vs Amazon S3
item.description: I just got activation for Google Storage for Developers . Service is similar to Amazon S3 but it’s served by Google and it’s still in beta mode – that’s mean that you can’t just register and use, and you have limited warranty about quality and uptime.
